text:
May 23, 1955
Mr* John Henderson
Station WBAA
Purdue University
Lafayette, Indiana
Dear Johnt
I think your committee's working on the
assessment charged school stations* The attached
copy of the letter from Marie Scanlon will give
you an idea of her thoughts on the matter*
Sincerely,
FESjJe
Sic*
Frank E. Schooley
President
